Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - SDGs and Beyond

ExpressionView.SQL: SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='YesNoNAQuestion'

select M.ID, M.PARTNER_ID, CP1.DESIGNATION, CP1.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY from CP14NONUNPARTNER_SPECIFIC_ACTIVITIES M, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v WHERE M.PARENT_ID = CP1.ID AND CP1.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP1.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND CP1.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 and CP1.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR

select CASE WHEN cp14.DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY, CASE WHEN cp14.DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS, CASE WHEN cp14.DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE, CASE WHEN cp14.INTERAGENCY_EFFORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as INTERAGENCY_EFFORT, CASE WHEN cp14.INTERAGENCY_GROUP = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as INTERAGENCY_GROUP, CASE WHEN cp14.BUDGET_ACTIVITY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as BUDGET_ACTIVITY, CASE WHEN cp14.COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN, CASE WHEN cp14.USEIATISTANDARDS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as USEIATISTANDARDS, cp14.ID, cp14.DESIGNATION, cp14.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp14.JOINTUNCTEFFORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as JOINTUNCTEFFORT, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_SUPPORT_TO_NATIONAL_STATS_CAPACITY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_SUPPORT_TO_NATIONAL_STATS_CAPACITY, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_INNOVATION_CITIZEN_ENGAGEMENT_CROWDSOURCING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_INNOVATION_CITIZEN_ENGAGEMENT_CROWDSOURCING, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_NONUNPARTNERS_SPECIFIC_ACTIVITIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_NONUNPARTNERS_SPECIFIC_ACTIVITIES, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_GOVERNMENT_REQUESTED_SUPPORT_ON_NATL_RESPONSESDG = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_GOVERNMENT_REQUESTED_SUPPORT_ON_NATL_RESPONSESDG, CASE WHEN cp14.HAS_OPEN_DATA_TRANSPARENCY_POLICIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_OPEN_DATA_TRANSPARENCY_POLICIES, CASE WHEN cp14.PARTICIPATES_IN_CROSS_BORDER_INITIATIVES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as PARTICIPATES_IN_CROSS_BORDER_INITIATIVES, CASE WHEN cp14.JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT, CASE WHEN cp14.GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED, CASE WHEN c.DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR, CASE WHEN c.DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY, CASE WHEN s.MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING, CASE WHEN s.UN_PROVIDED_MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UN_PROVIDED_MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING, CASE WHEN s.MAINSTREAMING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as MAINSTREAMING, CASE WHEN s.UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING, CASE WHEN s.GENERAL_ORIENTATION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as GENERAL_ORIENTATION, CASE WHEN s.UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION, CASE WHEN s.REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS, CASE WHEN s.UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS, CASE WHEN r.HASUNSUPPORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNSUPPORT, CASE WHEN r.INTERAGENCY_EFFORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as REPORT_INTERAGENCY_EFFORT, r.USED_FOR_VOLUNTARY_NATIONAL_REVIEW_ID, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP14EMERGING_ISSUES cp14, CP14COMMONUNDATA_STRATEGY c, CP14SDGSUPPORT s, CP14GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT r, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v WHERE cp14.ID = c.PARENT_ID AND cp14.ID = s.PARENT_ID AND cp14.ID = r.PARENT_ID AND cp14.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp14.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR AND cp14.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp14.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND cp14.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 and cp14.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp14.ENTITY_YEAR

Dimension.name: Year
Dimension.caption: Year

Dimension.name: Partner
Dimension.caption: Partner

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of UNCT Partners

Dimension.name: Year
Dimension.caption: Year

Dimension.name: DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY
Dimension.caption: Does the government have an updated and operational National Strategy for the Development of Statistics?

Dimension.name: DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS
Dimension.caption: Does the government have formal mechanisms to coordinate statistical development efforts with development partners, including the United Nations?

Dimension.name: DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT participate in this mechanism?

Dimension.name: Support to national statistical capacity
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT provide support to national statistical capacity?

Dimension.name: INTERAGENCY_EFFORT
Dimension.caption: Is this an interagency effort?

Dimension.name: INTERAGENCY_GROUP
Dimension.caption: Is there an interagency group on data and statistics?

Dimension.name: BUDGET_ACTIVITY
Dimension.caption: Is there a budget for this activity?

Dimension.name: COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN
Dimension.caption: Is there a common interagency workplan for this activity?

Dimension.name: Citizen engagement or other crowd-sourcing
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT apply innovation during UN country programming?

Dimension.name: JOINTUNCTEFFORT
Dimension.caption: Is it a joint UNCT effort? (applying innovation)

Dimension.name: UNCT convene partners beyond the UN
Dimension.caption: Does your UNCT convene partners beyond the UN for specific policy activities?

Dimension.name: Sustainable Development Goals
Dimension.caption: Has your government requested support on their national response to Sustainable Development Goals?

Dimension.name: Data/transparency policies or portals
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have open data/transparency portals?

Dimension.name: USEIATISTANDARDS
Dimension.caption: Do you use IATI standards in the portal?

Dimension.name: Cross-border initiatives
Dimension.caption: Does your UNCT participate in cross-border initiatives?

Dimension.name: JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have a joint UN initiative on data or statistics?

Attribute.name: JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT
Attribute.caption: Does the UNCT have a joint UN initiative on data or statistics?

Dimension.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR
Dimension.caption: Does this include data activity with private sector?

Attribute.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR
Attribute.caption: Does this include data activity with private sector?

Dimension.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY
Dimension.caption: Does this include data activity with civil society?

Attribute.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY
Attribute.caption: Does this include data activity with civil society?

Dimension.name: MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING
Dimension.caption: Did the government request support for SDG Measurement and Reporting?

Attribute.caption: Did the government request support for SDG Measurement and Reporting?

Dimension.caption: Did the UN provide support for SDG Measurement and Reporting?

Attribute.caption: Did the UN provide support for SDG Measurement and Reporting?

Dimension.name: MAINSTREAMING
Dimension.caption: Did the government request support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans?

Attribute.name: MAINSTREAMING
Attribute.caption: Did the government request support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans?

Dimension.name: UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING
Dimension.caption: Did the UN provide support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans?

Attribute.name: UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING
Attribute.caption: Did the UN provide support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans?

Dimension.name: GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Dimension.caption: Did the government request support for General Orientation on SDGs?

Attribute.name: GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Attribute.caption: Did the government request support for General Orientation on SDGs?

Dimension.name: UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Dimension.caption: Did the UN provide support for General Orientation on SDGs?

Attribute.name: UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Attribute.caption: Did the UN provide support for General Orientation on SDGs?

Dimension.name: REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Dimension.caption: Did the government request support on specific SDGs?

Attribute.name: REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Attribute.caption: Did the government request support on specific SDGs?

Dimension.name: UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Dimension.caption: Did the UN provide support on specific SDGs?

Attribute.name: UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Attribute.caption: Did the UN provide support on specific SDGs?

Dimension.name: GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED
Dimension.caption: Has your partner government published a Country-led SDG Report this year?

Attribute.name: GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED
Attribute.caption: Has your partner government published a Country-led SDG Report this year?

Dimension.name: HASUNSUPPORT
Dimension.caption: Has the UN supported the Government in producing the report?

Attribute.name: HASUNSUPPORT
Attribute.caption: Has the UN supported the Government in producing the report?

Dimension.name: REPORT_INTERAGENCY_EFFORT
Dimension.caption: Was the support provided as an interagency effort?

Attribute.name: REPORT_INTERAGENCY_EFFORT
Attribute.caption: Was the support provided as an interagency effort?

Dimension.name: usedForVoluntaryNationalReview
Dimension.caption: Was the support provided as an interagency effort?

Attribute.name: usedForVoluntaryNationalReview
Attribute.caption: Was the support provided as an interagency effort?

Measure.name: Count
Measure.caption: Number of Country Records Submitted

Measure.name: DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_NATIONAL_STRATEGY
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the government have an updated and operational National Strategy for the Development of Statistics?'

Measure.name: DOES_GOVERNMENT_HAVE_FORMAL_MECHANISMS
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the government have formal mechanisms to coordinate statistical development efforts with development partners, including the United Nations?'

Measure.name: DOESUNCTPARTICIPATE
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT participate in this mechanism?'

Measure.name: SupportNationalstatisticalcapacity
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT provide support to national statistical capacity

Measure.name: INTERAGENCY_EFFORT
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is this an interagency effort?'

Measure.name: INTERAGENCY_GROUP
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is there an interagency group on data and statistics?'

Measure.name: BUDGET_ACTIVITY
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is there a budget for this activity?'

Measure.name: COMMON_INTERAGENCY_WORKPLAN
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is there a common interagency workplan for this activity?'

Measure.name: CitizenEngagementCrowdSourcing
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT apply innovation during UN country programming?'

Measure.name: JOINTUNCTEFFORT
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is it a joint UNCT effort?' (applying innovation)

Measure.name: UNCTConvenePartnersBeyondUN
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT convene partners beyond the UN for specific policy activities

Measure.name: SustainableDevelopmentGoals
Measure.caption: Count of government requested support on their national response to Sustainable Development Goals

Measure.name: DataRransparencyPoliciesPortals
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT have open data/transparency portals?'

Measure.name: USEIATISTANDARDS
Measure.caption: Count of 'Do you use IATI standards in the portal?'

Measure.name: CrossBorderInitiatives
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT participate in cross-border initiatives

Measure.name: JOINTUNINITIATIVE_ON_DATA_OR_STATISTICS_PRESENT
Measure.caption: Count of UNCT that have a joint UN initiative on data or statistics

Measure.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_PRIVATE_SECTOR
Measure.caption: Count of data activity with private sector

Measure.name: DATA_ACTIVITY_WITH_CIVIL_SOCIETY
Measure.caption: Count of data activity with civil society

Measure.name: MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING
Measure.caption: Count of government requests to support for SDG Measurement and Reporting

Measure.name: UN_PROVIDED_MEASUREMENT_AND_REPORTING
Measure.caption: Count of UN provided support for SDG Measurement and Reporting

Measure.name: MAINSTREAMING
Measure.caption: Count of government requests to support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans

Measure.name: UN_PROVIDED_MAINSTREAMING
Measure.caption: Count of UN provided support for Mainstreaming SDG in National Development Plans

Measure.name: GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Measure.caption: Count of government requests to support for General Orientation on SDGs

Measure.name: UN_PROVIDED_GENERAL_ORIENTATION
Measure.caption: Count of UN provided support for General Orientation on SDGs

Measure.name: REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Measure.caption: Count of government requests to support on specific SDGs

Measure.name: UN_PROVIDED_REQUESTS_ON_SPECIFICSDGS
Measure.caption: Count of UN provided support on specific SDGs

Measure.name: GOVERNMENTSDGREPORT_PUBLISHED
Measure.caption: Count of partner governments that published a Country-led SDG Report this year

Measure.name: HASUNSUPPORT
Measure.caption: Count of UN supported the Government in producing the report

Measure.name: REPORT_INTERAGENCY_EFFORT
Measure.caption: Count of UN supported the Government in producing the report as an interagency effort

ForeignKeyLink.dimension: UNCT convene partners beyond the UN
